post:
We are very happy with the feedback we are receiving from our product at [bitaccel.com/](http://www.bitaccel.com/)

We allow most anything that is legal. We allow IRC and VPN.

Servers hosted in Buffalo, NY
1 Core
1GB Ram - Guaranteed
60GB HDD - Raid10
1TB Bandwidth (1024GB)

$3.50/mo with promo code 50OFF
Order NOW!

Be sure to use promo code 50OFF!
